answers.answer: If it doesn't improve, see your doctor. It doesn't sound diabetes related.

question: about 5 days ago, I twisted my right knee, it still hurts, but, above my knee is hurting, burning, needle like stabs, hurts to touch skin and hurts to walk on my leg  now. does anyone know what is the cause of my needle like, burning in this leg above my knee? thanks for any suggestions.
title: above knee needle like jabs, burning, shocking and hurts to touch leg?
